summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff introduces multiple new UI sections and social features (People page, following/followers, message likes), plus navigation and app-behavior changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new People page with user cards and follow/unfollow UI (including loading states, skeletons, tabs, and error alerts).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so adding a new page and social UI is out of scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new "People" section to app navigation and wired it into section routing.
Implemented/added React Query hooks for social features like following/followers and follow/unfollow, and message likes (like/unlike/hasLiked/getMessageLikes).
Added message-like UI/behavior to the chat message timeline (like button, counts, loading state).
hallucinated_features.reason: No chat interaction changes were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed app startup behavior to register a service worker on mount.
hallucinated_features.reason: No PWA/service-worker behavior was requested in this BuildRequest.
